prompt_text: Between 6 PM and 11 PM every day, turn on the living room lights to 80% brightness
automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_light_1800_2300_80pct'
alias: Evening Living Room Light to 80%
description: "Between 6:00 PM and 11:00 PM every day, automatically turn on the Living Room Light to 80% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '18:00:00'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '18:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: off, dim, brighten
Could you clarify: Timing sequence is unclear - should actions happen simultaneously or sequentially?
